articles.description: ​The festive vibes are all around as everyone celebrated the most awaited festival- Diwali yesterday (12th November). The celebs took to their social media and gave a glimpse into their celebration to their fans. While some celebrated it with their close ones…
articles.content: Debina and Gurmeet indeed had ‘Happy Diwali.’ The couple enjoyed the festival with their daughters and posted many pictures from the celebrations on social media. The family matched outfit in pink an… [+180 chars]
